About Me

My Introduction

Dynamic and goal-oriented Computer Engineer with a Bachelor's Degree and around 3 years of dedicated experience in Microsoft Dynamics CRM 365 and Power Platform. Skilled in developing customized Dynamics 365 solutions, PowerApps, workflows, and dashboards. Detail-oriented with a passion for delivering high-quality results.
